product_description: Product 8x8 "  individually packaged in black plastic trays with clear plastic dome lid is cornbread and it was MIS-LABELED as Angel Food Cake Bar.  The label of Angel Food Cake Bar has the UPC 111110-02100.      The label is read in parts: "***Angel Food Cake Bar *** Net wt. 12 oz *** Contains: Wheat and Eggs *** Distributed by Inter-American Products, Inc. Cincinnati, OH 45202***".
